trans-unit.target: TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_00<tab>Raubahn has some parting words for you ahead of the final phase of Operation Archon.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_01<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> stands ready to bear you to the Praetorium─the fortress within a fortress wherein the Ultima Weapon sleeps. Prepare for the fight of your life, and report to Cid at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_02<tab>You are ready to depart for the Praetorium, the stage upon which the fate of the realm shall soon be decided. Fight your way into the depths of the structure, in search of the Ultima Weapon, and when you find the Allagan relic...send a piece of it to each of the seven hells.
※Challenge the Praetorium with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_03<tab>Having swept aside all enemies in your path, you finally come face-to-face with Gaius van Baelsar himself. The confrontation concludes with the man's retreat, and you chase him to the Ultima Weapon's chamber.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_04<tab>Taking control of the fearsome weapon, the Black Wolf sets upon you once more. Do what you have come to do, and see that the magitek monstrosity never threatens Eorzea again.
※Challenge the Porta Decumana with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the trial's entrance point.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_05<tab>Shielded by Light, you weather the Ultima Weapon's relentless onslaught and succeed in laying it low. But your struggles are not yet over, for Lahabrea now intends to eliminate you himself, that none may prevent his god's rebirth.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_06<tab>As the Praetorium collapses around you, the Ascian descends to extinguish your flame. Strike down the servant of Darkness, and free your comrade Thancred from his enthrallment.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_07<tab>With Gaius van Baelsar slain, and the Ultima Weapon destroyed, it would seem that Eorzea may finally look forward to an era of peace. Yet even as the people of the three city<var 1F /var>states gather to celebrate their deliverance, a deafening roar reverberates throughout every corner of the realm... A dread primal has awakened.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_08<tab>What fearsome primal is this that has been roused? Perhaps Minfilia will be able to shed some light on the mystery.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SEQ_09<tab>In troubled tones, Minfilia reveals to you that shortly after the roar was heard around the land, an aetheric disturbance was observed, bearing a disquieting similarity to a phenomenon recorded five years ago. It would seem that your struggles are far from over. Steel your resolve anew, and set forth to shine the Crystal's light upon the realm.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cid at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_01<tab>Enter the Praetorium.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_02<tab>Enter the Praetorium.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_03<tab>Confront the Ultima Weapon at the Porta Decumana.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_04<tab>Confront the Ultima Weapon at the Porta Decumana.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_05<tab>Confront Lahabrea on the Porta Decumana.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_06<tab>Confront Lahabrea on the Porta Decumana.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Minfilia.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_RAUBAHN_000_000<tab>For the final phase of the operation, my Flames will storm Castrum Meridianum and suppress what is left of the imperial garrison. If all goes well, this will allow you to reach the Praetorium unopposed─fit and ready for your encounter with the Ultima Weapon.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_RAUBAHN_000_001<tab>Yours is the most dangerous mission of all, but the best must bear the heaviest burden, and you're the best we have. There's not another soul in this realm that could see this deed done, and Merlwyb and Kan<var 1F /var>E are of the same mind as me.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_RAUBAHN_000_002<tab>Though all hangs on your success, you must not let our plight make you desperate. Victory belongs to the bold, not the reckless. Bards are wont to sing of heroes who valued their life at naught next to honor, love, and liberty, but I tell you now: that which men value at naught, they sell cheap. Risk no more than you must, you hear me?

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_RAUBAHN_000_003<tab>Now, best you were off─we have work to do, the both of us. See that your preparations are in order, then report to Cid. He awaits you with the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> at the Ceruleum Processing Plant. May Rhalgr grant you strength.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_CID_000_010<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> is at your disposal. When you're ready to head for the Praetorium, you need only say the word.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_CID_000_011<tab>If we succeed in destroying the Ultima Weapon, it will deal a crippling blow to the Empire's hopes of conquest. After that, the XIVth Legion would not dare to move against us─barring the discovery of further Allagan doomsday devices, that is...
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_CID_000_012<tab>Let's be on our way, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Gaius and his plaything await!
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_CID_000_015<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> is at your disposal. When you're ready to head for the Praetorium, you need only say the word.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_Q1_000_000<tab>Proceed inside the Praetorium?
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SYSTEM_100_900<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 50 or above to proceed.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_MINFILIA_000_900<tab>The Archons have conducted a preliminary investigation into the origin of the roar that rang out during the celebration. Their findings strongly suggest that a new primal has appeared.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_MINFILIA_000_901<tab>The roar generated a distinctive wave pattern in the aether, a pattern observed only once before in history─five years ago, to be precise. I should like to think it mere coincidence, yet we cannot discount that possibility... Well, I trust I need say no more.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_MINFILIA_000_902<tab>At great sacrifice, we have delivered Eorzea from the threat posed by the Empire and the primals, and thereby secured peace. We cannot well allow the realm to be plunged into chaos once more.

TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_MINFILIA_000_903<tab>You have given your all for our cause, risking life and limb on I know not how many occasions, yet our struggle continues, and we need you now no less than before.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_MINFILIA_000_904<tab>Please continue to stand with us, and together we shall safeguard the future of the realm─of this very star!
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SYSTEM_000_910<tab>You can now fly while mounted in La Noscea, Thanalan, the Black Shroud, Coerthas central highlands, and Mor Dhona.
TEXT_XXCFST503_04522_SYSTEM_000_911<tab>To take flight, simply jump while mounted.
